column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: ミファーのことが聞きたい
column4: Tell me about Mipha.

column3: さよなら
column4: Farewell!

column3: 試練のことを教えて
column4: Tell me about the trial.

column3: 日記？
column4: Mipha's Diary?

column3:
おお"英傑様ではありませんか！
こんな所で お会いするとは！
今私はムズリ殿の護衛で
ここに来ているんですよ
何でもこの場所にミファー様が受けた
試練があったとのことで…
詳しい話はムズリ殿から
聞かれると良いでしょう
column4:
Oh! It's the Champion, Master Link!
How are things?

As for me, I'm here to protect Sir Muzu.


I hear at this very location...is a trial that
Princess Mipha herself challenged!

If you want more information,
please talk to Sir Muzu.

column3:
ここまで来るのは大変でした…
道中魔物に何度襲われたことか…
でも ムズリ殿は「シド王子の役に立たねば」
と張り切っていましたよ
column4:
It was a nuisance to get here...
Monsters came out and attacked
us countless times...
But Sir Muzu was determined. He kept
mumbling to himself, \"I must prove
my usefulness to Prince Sidon.\"

column3:
ムズリ殿から
帰り支度を整えるように言われましたが…
また あの道のりを考えると辛いですね…
column4:
Sir Muzu said to pack up and prepare to
return home.

Yeesh, but even just thinking about
treading the path we took here again
makes me miserable...

column3:
ゾーラの里の外に出ていたのですが
まだまだ危険が多いですね
私も里の警備に力を入れますよ！
column4:
I was just outside Zora's Domain, but it
still seems pretty dangerous out there.

I'll have to make sure I'm extra alert
when guarding the domain!

column3:
ムズリ殿は「シド王子の役に立てた」
と喜んでおられましたよ
column4:
I overheard Sir Muzu mumble, \"I finally
proved my usefulness to Prince Sidon.\" 
He seemed very happy about it.

column3:
リンク何かに困ったら
いつでも この里に来るがよい
どんな時でも一族全員で歓迎するゾヨ！

さっそくだが…
何か力になれることはあるゾヨか？
column4:
If you ever run into trouble, know that
you are always welcome here.

No matter the time, we shall all greet
you with open fins!

Now then... Is there anything I can
help you with?

column3:
フム いいゾヨ… ソナタにミファーのことを
聞いてもらうのも あの子への供養ゾヨ
ミファーは昔から気立てが優しくてな…"里の者
旅の者…分け隔てなく親切にする子だったゾヨ
ソナタが幼き頃 ここを訪れた時も
まるで もう一人の弟のように可愛がっておった
だが ハイリア人はワシらより成長が早い
やがてあの子は ソナタを見上げるようになり…
ミファーの日記にも書いてあったように…
ソナタを慕うように なっていったゾヨ
ゾーラの姫がハイリア人の剣士に恋い焦がれる…
我らの伝説にも そんな話があったゾヨ
だからワシは いつかソナタとミファーが
夫婦となるならば それも良しと思っておった…
残念ゾヨ…
column4:
Yes, of course you wish to hear about
our dear Mipha. I am sure it would bring
her peace to know she is on your mind.
Mipha was always kind, from the day she
was born. She was equally as kind to her
own as she was to complete strangers.
When you first took to visiting us,
back when you were but a child,
she adored you like a brother.
However, as you know, Hylians age much
faster than us. Eventually you grew so
much, she began to look up to you...
As Mipha's Diary plainly states...it was
not long before she developed strong
feelings for you.
A Zora princess falling in love with a
Hylian swordsman...

It reminds me of a Zora legend of old.
That is why I welcomed the idea of you
and Mipha becoming husband and wife.
It is a shame you two never had the
chance to see what might have been...

column3:
ウム最近見つかったゾヨ… ワシは嬉しくてな
ミファーの日記はそこの机に置いてあるゾヨ
…ソナタなら読んでも良いゾヨ
ミファーも きっと許してくれると思うゾヨ
column4:
Ah, of course. Mipha's Diary was found
just recently. Its discovery brought me
much joy. It is on that table over there.
I do not mind if you choose to
read it. I am sure Mipha would
forgive you anything.

column3:
何かに困ったら いつでも来るが良い
ソナタは もはや家族のようなものゾヨ
column4:
If you need anything, please know that
I am always here for you. After all...
we are practically family.

column3:
ワシが力になれる事なら
何でも言うゾヨ
column4:
If you need anything, I am ever at
your disposal.

column3:
リンクか… ここへは何しに来たゾラ？

ワシらは シド王子に
この地を調べるように言われてきたゾラ
column4:
Ah! It is you, Link. What brings you
to this place?

We are here at the behest of
Prince Sidon, who tasked us
with keeping watch on this area.

column3:
ここはミファー様が試練を受けた場所
100年後の今当時と同じ異変が起きているゾラ
column4:
This is the land where Princess Mipha
completed her sacred trial.

Now, the signs that appeared 100 years
ago have returned...

column3:
ミファー様は文献で見つけた…

「朝日が昇る時光の道を進みし先に試練あり」

という この試練に関する言葉を
繰り返し呟かれておったゾラが…
column4:
Princess Mipha's notes had this phrase...
\"While the morning sun is newly born,
follow the path of light to the trial.\"
I am not sure where they came from,
but she often repeated those mysterious
words about the trial...

column3:
おお リンクか

ミファー様が見つけられた
この試練に関係する文献には…
「朝日が昇る時光の道を進みし先に試練あり」

…と書かれていたようゾラ
column4:
Ah! It is you, Link.


Princess Mipha's notes contained
a phrase related to the trial...

\"While the morning sun is newly born,
follow the path of light to the trial.\"

I wonder what it means...

column3:
なんと…"光の道とは海に映る
太陽の光だったゾラか！
すでに文献の謎を解いておったとは！
さすがミファー様が惚れし英傑 あっぱれゾラ！
column4:
Could it be? Have you already figured
out Mipha's riddle? The path of light...
Ah! The sun's reflection upon the sea!
I cannot believe you solved it so readily!
It is ever more apparent why you are the
one who stole Princess Mipha's heart.
I am thoroughly impressed!

column3:
光の道とは
海に映る太陽の光だったゾラか
さすがミファー様が惚れし英傑
あっぱれゾラ！
column4:
The path of light...is the sun's reflection
upon the sea!

It is ever more apparent why you are the
one who stole Princess Mipha's heart.
I am thoroughly impressed!

column3:
む！ リンク！

ヒレもエラも持たぬばかりか
水に溺れるという信じ難き種族にもかかわらず…
ミファー様と同じ試練を克服するとは！

さすがミファー様の想い人
あっぱれゾラ
column4:
Link!


I've been thinking. Your race has no fins
or gills, and you sink like a stone in
the water.
Yet somehow, you managed to complete
the same trial as Princess Mipha!

It is no wonder our princess has a
special place in her heart for you.
I am thoroughly impressed!

column3:
ミファー様と同じ試練を克服するとは
さすが ミファー様の想い人 あっぱれゾラ
column4:
Somehow, you managed to complete
the same trial as Princess Mipha!

It is no wonder our princess has a
special place in her heart for you.
I am thoroughly impressed!

column3:
どうゾラ？ お主も水に流してくれんゾラか？
ゾーラの里だけに…
……

今のは忘れてほしいゾラ

そんなことより！
column4:
Well, Link? Will you please allow my prior
rudeness to wash away with the tides?
Such is the magic of Zora's Domain.
...
...

Ahem, perhaps I am overly dramatic.
Please forgive and forget that as well.

Now, on to more serious matters!

column3:
ゾラ台地にミファー様が試練を受けた時と
同じやつが現れているゾラ
当時はミファー様が退治なさったが…
今回は いったい誰が試練を受けているゾラ?
まさか…

ワシ？
column4:
The same creatures that appeared when
Lady Mipha challenged her sacred trial
have returned to Upland Zorana.
Lady Mipha defeated them with her usual
grace and skill. I wonder...is the trial
calling to someone new?
Could it be...


ME?!

column3:
おお リンクか！ ちょうど良いところに…
向こうを見てみるゾラ
column4:
Link! Exquisite timing.
Look over there!

column3:
ミファー様が試練を受けた時と同じやつが
向こうのゾラ台地に現れてるゾラ
column4:
The same creatures that appeared when
Lady Mipha challenged her sacred trial
have returned to Upland Zorana.

column3:
当時はミファー様が退治なさったが…
今回は いったい誰が試練を受けているゾラ?
column4:
Lady Mipha defeated them with her usual
grace and skill. I wonder...is the trial
calling to someone new?

column3:
ゾラ台地に出現していたガーディアンは
お主が倒したようゾラな
ミファー様が受けた試練を
お主も克服するとは…
さすが英傑褒めてやるゾラ！
column4:
You seem to have defeated the Guardians
that appeared in Upland Zorana.

I did not imagine you would be able to
conquer the same trial as Lady Mipha.

I suppose that is why you have earned
the title of Champion. Please accept
my congratulations!

column3:
ところで…"ゾラ台地に出現していた
ガーディアンを倒したのは お主ゾラな？
ミファー様が受けた試練であったが
お主も克服してしまうとはな…
さすが英傑褒めてやるゾラ！
column4:
By the way... Were you the one who
defeated the Guardians that
appeared in Upland Zorana?
I did not imagine you would be able to
conquer the same trial as Lady Mipha.

I suppose that is why you have earned
the title of Champion. Please accept
my congratulations!

column3:
ん？ こんなところで
ハイリアの方とは珍し…
って リンク様ではありませんか！
神獣 ヴァ・ルッタの件では本当にお世話に…
いや それはそうと リンク様…"ゾラ台地に
青い目のガーディアンが現れたゾラ
ミファー様が試練を受けた時にも
同じやつが現れたとかで…
親父は心配ないと言っているのですが
念のため見張っているゾラ
column4:
Hm? It is rare to see a Hylian here...


Oh, how silly of me! It is none other than
Master Link! I am happy to see you,
old friend.
I must sincerely thank you for your help
with that Divine Beast Vah Ruta mess.

While you are here, I should warn you...
Blue-eyed Guardians have appeared in
Upland Zorana.
Apparently, those things last appeared
when Lady Mipha challenged her
sacred trial.
My father insists they are no cause
for alarm, but I am on high alert
just in case.

column3:
青い目のガーディアンはミファー様が
試練を受けた時にも現れたらしいゾラ
あいつらがゾーラの里まで襲ってこないか
兵隊長としては不安ゾラ…
column4:
Apparently, those blue-eyed Guardians
last appeared when Lady Mipha
challenged her sacred trial.
As captain of the guard, I am concerned
those creatures may launch an attack
on Zora's Domain...

column3:
青い目のガーディアンがいなくなったら
祠が現れたみたいゾラ！
やはり あのガーディアンは
試練に関係していたようゾラ
column4:
When those blue-eyed Guardians left,
a strange shrine appeared. I knew those
Guardians were related to the trial!

column3:
ルッタが鎮座したといえども油断は禁物…
以前と同じく里の警備をするゾラ
column4:
Even though Ruta has been tamed,
we must not let our guard down. I shall
guard the domain as diligently as ever!

column3:
ああ リンク！ よく来てくれたな！
神獣 ヴァ・ルッタの件はありがとう！
元老院の爺様方の反対を押し切ってでも…

ハイリア人のキミに 
里を救うのを手伝ってもらったこと！
本当に良かったと思っているゾ！

雨が降り続けて魔物の増えた
里までの道中を来てくれたこと…
ルッタの攻撃をかいくぐって
電気の矢で装置を起動させてくれたこと…
ルッタを取り戻して
ミファー姉さんの無念を晴らしてくれたこと…
リンク…
キミには感謝してもしきれないゾ！
こんな強引なオレに最後まで
ついて来てくれて本当にありがとう！
キミがいなければ
今のゾーラの里は無かった！
これからも何かあったら
この里に立ち寄ってくれ！
オレたちはいつでも
キミの手助けをするゾ！
ああ！最高だゾッ！

リンク！ キミは最高のハイリア人
そしてオレの最高の友だ！
…っと すまない 
いつもの癖で話しすぎたゾ
だが これがオレの感謝の気持ちなんだ

それで… 
リンクは何の用事で来たんだ？
column4:
Link! I must thank you for journeying all
this way! And, of course, for taming that
feisty Divine Beast Vah Ruta!
You somehow overcame the objections
of the old geezers on our council,
all to help save our home!
Yes, you are a treasure of a Hylian!
Taking time out of your journey to come
to our rain- and monster-ridden home!
And here you activated those orbs with
shock arrows, freed Ruta, and released
my sister from her lingering regret.
Link... I simply can't thank you enough!
Especially for following me to the end,
pushy and unreasonable as I am!
Zora's Domain would still be in peril if
not for you. You are welcome anytime,
and we are ever at your service!
Have I mentioned how incredible
you are? And how thankful I am?Because you are! And I am! Yes, you are
the greatest of Hylians and my most
treasured friend for all time!
Ah... You must forgive me. I am but a
rambling fool, wasting the time of my
cherished friend and hero of the Zora.
I do hope you understand that I carry on
so only because I am ever so grateful
for all you have done and ever will do!
But I digress. Link! Might I ask what
brings you to our beloved domain?

column3:
ああ リンク！ よく来てくれたな！
神獣 ヴァ・ルッタの件はありがとう！
元老院の爺様方の反対を押し切ってでも…

ハイリア人のキミに
里を救うのを手伝ってもらったこと！
本当に良かったと思っているゾ！

雨が降り続けて魔物の増えた
里までの道中を来てくれたこと…
ルッタの攻撃をかいくぐって
電気の矢で装置を起動させてくれたこと…
ルッタを取り戻して
ミファー姉さんの無念を晴らしてくれたこと…
リンク…
キミには感謝してもしきれないゾ！
こんな強引なオレに最後まで
ついて来てくれて本当にありがとう！
キミがいなければ
今のゾーラの里は無かった！
これからも何かあったら
この里に立ち寄ってくれ！
オレたちはいつでも
キミの手助けをするゾ！
ああ！最高だゾッ！

リンク！ キミは最高のハイリア人
そしてオレの最高の友だ！
…っと すまない 
いつもの癖で話しすぎたゾ
だが これがオレの感謝の気持ちなんだ

それで… 
リンクは何の用事で来たんだ？
column4:
Link! I must thank you for journeying all
this way! And, of course, for taming that
feisty Divine Beast Vah Ruta!
You somehow overcame the objections
of the old geezers on our council,
all to help save our home!
Yes, you are a treasure of a Hylian!
Taking time out of your journey to come
to our rain- and monster-ridden home!
And here you activated those orbs with
shock arrows, freed Ruta, and released
my sister from her lingering regret.
Link... I simply can't thank you enough!
Especially for following me to the end,
pushy and unreasonable as I am!
Zora's Domain would still be in peril if
not for you. You are welcome anytime,
and we are ever at your service!
Have I mentioned how incredible
you are? And how thankful I am?Because you are! And I am! Yes, you are
the greatest of Hylians and my most
treasured friend for all time!
Ah... You must forgive me. I am but a
rambling fool, wasting the time of my
cherished friend and hero of the Zora.
I do hope you understand that I carry on
so only because I am ever so grateful
for all you have done and ever will do!
But I digress. Link! Might I ask what
brings you to our beloved domain?

column3:
試練？
…そういう事か リンク！
実は最近ミファー姉さんがルッタに乗るために
試練を受けた時と同じ異変が起きているんだゾ
調査の為に試練の地の一つであるウルラ峡谷
の東にムズリとタッカを向かわせたんだが…
ナゾが解けたゾ！
キミが試練を受けていたんだな！
column4:
The sacred trial my sister challenged?
You are a keen one, Link!

I have recently noticed certain things
that last occurred when my dear sister,
Mipha, took the trial to master Ruta.
That is why I sent Muzu and Tottika to
stand guard east of Ulria Grotto. It was
one of the areas associated with the trial.
...Link! Yes, I have figured it out.
YOU are challenging the sacred trial!
I wish you luck, my friend.

column3:
リンクは試練に向かうんだろ？
きっと成し遂げられると信じてるゾ！
オレはキミの事を応援しているゾ
オレたちは最高の友達だからな！
column4:
You ARE intending to challenge the
sacred trial, are you not? I have no
doubt you shall succeed!
I am cheering you on, as ever!
After all, you are my most treasured
friend and hero of the Zora!

column3:
ミファー姉さんのこと？
そうだな…
最近気づいたんだが100年前時々現れては
ミファー姉さんと よく一緒にいた剣士…
オレは そいつに姉さんを取られたように感じ
悔しかったんだが… あの剣士は…
キミだったんだなリンク！

おっと キミをリンクと呼ぶのは失礼かな？

なぜならキミは もしかしたら姉さんの夫…
オレの義兄さんに なっていたかも…
…

いや つい興奮して余計なことを…
すまん忘れてくれリンク！
column4:
You wish to speak of my sister?
I am always happy to do so.

Actually, I recently remembered
something...a fuzzy memory
from my early childhood.
There was a swordsman that came by
every so often and spent a considerable
amount of time with Mipha.
At the time, it felt like he was stealing my
sister away from me. I know better now.
But...that swordsman...
It was you, Link. I am certain of it.
I do hope my bluntness has not
offended you.
Had things turned out differently,
you might have been my sister's
husband...my brother-in-law...
Oh! My apologies. I got carried away and
let my imagination run wild. Please forget
my childish musings, my friend!

column3:
そうか…
また いつでもここに立ち寄ってくれ！
オレはいつでも
キミの事を応援しているゾ！
column4:
Should you ever have need of me,
do not hesitate to reach out.

I shall be cheering you on, as ever!

column3:
おお リンク！
よく来てくれたな！
column4: Link! I am so happy to see you!

column3:
リンク！どうした？
他に聞きたい事があるのか？
column4:
What is it, Link? Is there something else
you wish to talk about?

column3: オレに何か用なのか？
column4: Can I help you in some way?

column3:
そうだ リンク
何か用があって来たんじゃないのか？
column4:
Oh, of course. I assume some heroic
errand has brought you here.

column3: リンク他にも聞きたいことはあるのか？
column4:
Is there anything else I can
help you with?
